name: ProChains – Best Dropship and Affiliate Tools for WooCommerce
author: Artareja Media

sections.description:
ProChains is the best tool for Dropship and Affiliates, build your own store easily.

You can get products and sell them on WooCommerce just from the product url in marketplace. ProChains will automatically extract the product data for you.

For now, our service is integrated with Shopee, Tokopedia and Bukalapak. In the future, our services will be integrated with several other leading marketplaces in Indonesia.

Plugin Installation and Demo

Plugin Features

Bulk Import

Yes, you can bulk import products by simply entering the product url. So it can save your precious time.

Auto Synchronization

No need to worry about your product being outdated. With the automatic synchronization feature, your products that are still actively connected will always be updated.

Dropship Fields

Make it a dropship product, and earn your own profit. Price flexibility is the key.

Affiliate Fields

Create your affiliate links, sell products and make money from them. You can do it now.

Third Party: Terms and Conditions

We use third party services in the form of an open API (READ ONLY). In its use, each user must comply with applicable laws. ProChains is not responsible for any acts of abuse committed by users of this plugin.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WooCommerce 6.4.1 or greater is recommend
  • PHP 7.4 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.7 or greater is recommended

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of ProChains, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New.”

In the search field type “ProChains”, then click “Search Plugins.” Once you’ve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click “Install Now,” and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the ProChains plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
How much do I have to pay to get this plugin?

It’s FREE. For now you don’t have to pay a penny and enjoy our services.

  • Update API – Added API for Tokopedia products.
  • Please update to the latest version at least 2.1.3, because the previous version is deprecated.

1.1.3 2022-05-25

  • Update README – Add plugin features, installation and demo video.

1.1.2 2022-05-24

  • Update README

1.1.1 2022-05-24

  • Fix bug – In some versions of wordpress, product images are not uploaded.

1.1.0 2022-05-22

  • Added a feature for automatic synchronization of product data.

1.0.0 2022-05-18

  • First feature release – Bulk import from online store for dropship or affiliate products.

short_description: An easy way to connect products from multiple marketplaces to your WooCommerce.
